content: Can anyone please suggest some introductory but standard literature on polycategories? Also, separately I need some literature suggestion on properads. Thanks in advance!!
Did you check out the references cited at [[polycategory]] and [[properad]]?
Thanks, I checked the nlab references. Actually, I was thinking if there are any recent literatures (written more in an expository manner).
Not sure if this qualifies, but there is the Blanco-Zeilberger paper Bifibrations of Polycategories and Classical Linear Logic.
(which I just added to the nLab page)
My paper LNL polycategories and doctrines of linear logic is mostly about something more expressive than a plain polycategory, but it's a bit expository too.
@Mike Shulman Thanks a lot for sharing the paper!!

Mike Shulman said:

Not sure if this qualifies, but there is the Blanco-Zeilberger paper Bifibrations of Polycategories and Classical Linear Logic.

Yes, this paper looks great!! :) Thanks again!
Thanks a lot @Mike Shulman for sharing the paper and @ADITTYA CHAUDHURI for the nice comment. If you want something more comprehensive there is also my PhD thesis, especially II.2.
You can find it here Bifibrations of Polycategories and Classical Linear Logic

Nicolas Blanco said:

You can find it here Bifibrations of Polycategories and Classical Linear Logic

Thanks a lot!!
